description:
## Company Aims and Ethics

Armour Windows have worked hard to build up our fantastic reputation as Coventry’s friendly and professional supplier and installer of double glazing, doors and conservatories.

A company you can trust to deliver stunning home transformations.

## Reliable Products

Armour Windows proudly work with leading brands to provide Coventry with truly robust and cost effective windows, doors and conservatories.

* We take the time to ensure our double glazing will exceed your expectations, last a lifetime and require little to no maintenance on your behalf.
* Fully customisable double glazing from Coventry’s leading home improvement company.
* The results? Hassle free double glazing that gives your property high levels of energy efficiency and security.
* On top of this, you get all the support you need from us. We are always just a phone call away.
